Hi everyone,
  I have some questions how Heritrix behave when it revisit the website. 
  If I have two crawl orders with default setting, then how Heritrix behave in the second crawl. Doed it re-crawl every web pages or just the changed one ?
  Or if I using the AdaptiveRevisitFrontier, how Heritrix do when revisiting the webpage. Does it record only the changed page or the whole website again ? How can I check whether it retrieve the changed page only or not?
   
  Really appreciate your help
  Thanks,
